name: Shark Shock
description: Shark Shock's origin is White Widow crossed with Skunk #1.  Has a fruity taste and carries intense stoney effects.  The plant will grow into a densely compacted white skunk with extreme aromas.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Euphoric, Focused, Happy, Sleepy, Pain, Stress, Inflammation, Depression, Muscle Spasms, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Anxious, Dizzy, Headache
